/* SA011006.selectListSaleMst */ SELECT A.SALEID , A.SALEDATE , A.SALEGUBUN , fn_codename('01', '007', A.SALEGUBUN) AS NAME_SALEGUBUN , A.SALERCD , A.CONNAME , fn_formatnum('I', A.CONJUMINID) AS CONJUMINID , A.CONADDRESS , fn_formatnum('P', A.CONTELNO) AS CONTELNO , CAST(A.CONM2 AS DECIMAL(12, 2)) AS CONM2 , CAST(A.CONPY AS DECIMAL(12, 2)) AS CONPY , A.REMARK AS SALE_REMARK , B.CHGDATE , C.SALEAMT , C.SALEDANGA , C.DCGUBUN , fn_codename('01', '008', C.DCGUBUN) AS NAME_DCGUBUN , C.DCRATE , C.DCAMT , C.SELLAMT , (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(SUGUMAMT), 0) FROM sa_ipgumdtl S INNER JOIN sa_ipgumscheduletb T ON S.SALEID = T.SALEID AND S.IPGUMSEQ = T.IPGUMSEQ WHERE S.SALEID = A.SALEID AND T.DEPOSITGUBUN = '002') AS SUGUMAMT1 /* 계약금 */ , (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(SUGUMAMT), 0) FROM sa_ipgumdtl S INNER JOIN sa_ipgumscheduletb T ON S.SALEID = T.SALEID AND S.IPGUMSEQ = T.IPGUMSEQ WHERE S.SALEID = A.SALEID AND T.DEPOSITGUBUN = '003') AS SUGUMAMT2 /* 중도금 */ , (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(SUGUMAMT), 0) FROM sa_ipgumdtl S INNER JOIN sa_ipgumscheduletb T ON S.SALEID = T.SALEID AND S.IPGUMSEQ = T.IPGUMSEQ WHERE S.SALEID = A.SALEID AND T.DEPOSITGUBUN = '004') AS SUGUMAMT3 /* 잔금 */ , (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(SUGUMAMT), 0) FROM sa_ipgumdtl S INNER JOIN sa_ipgumscheduletb T ON S.SALEID = T.SALEID AND S.IPGUMSEQ = T.IPGUMSEQ WHERE S.SALEID = A.SALEID AND T.DEPOSITGUBUN IN ('002', '003', '004')) AS SUM_SUGUMAMT , D.SALEID AS REFUND_SALEID , IFNULL(D.REFUNDAMT, 0) AS REFUNDAMT , D.REFUNDDATE , D.REFUNDYN , D.BANKGUBUN , fn_codename('04', D.BANKGUBUN, NULL) AS NAME_BANKGUBUN , D.ACCTOWNER , D.ACCTNO , ((SELECT IFNULL(SUM(SUGUMAMT), 0) FROM sa_ipgumdtl S INNER JOIN sa_ipgumscheduletb T ON S.SALEID = T.SALEID AND S.IPGUMSEQ = T.IPGUMSEQ WHERE S.SALEID = A.SALEID AND T.DEPOSITGUBUN IN ('002', '003', '004')) - IFNULL(D.REFUNDAMT, 0)) AS KEEPAMT , D.EXPORTDATE , D.EXPORTYN , D.IPGUMID , D.REMARK AS REFUND_REMARK , I.KNAME , I.BRANCHCODE , fn_codename('02', I.BRANCHCODE, NULL) AS NAME_BRANCHCODE FROM sa_salemst A INNER JOIN sa_salehistorytb B ON A.SALEID = B.SALEID INNER JOIN sa_saledtl C ON A.SALEID = C.SALEID LEFT OUTER JOIN sa_refundtb D ON A.SALEID = D.SALEID LEFT OUTER JOIN hr_insamst I ON A.SALERCD = I.INSACODE WHERE B.CHGGUBUN = '004' /* 계약변동구분 = 해약 */
AND B.CHGDATE BETWEEN #S_CHGDATE_FR# AND #S_CHGDATE_TO#
AND I.KNAME LIKE '%$S_KNAME$%'
AND D.REFUNDYN = #S_REFUNDYN#
AND (D.REFUNDYN = #S_REFUNDYN# OR D.REFUNDYN IS NULL)
ORDER BY A.SALEID DESC
